data.name: WatchTV_labelSectionHeader
data.value: Do you want to watch TV with MediaPortal ?

data.name: WatchTV_on
data.value: Yes - I will use MediaPortal to watch TV.

data.name: WatchTV_off
data.value: No - I will not use MediaPortal to watch TV.

data.name: BaseInstallationNoTvEngine_labelOneClickDesc
data.value: All required applications will be installed into their default locations and with the default settings.

data.name: BaseInstallationNoTvEngine_labelAdvancedDesc
data.value: The advanced installation allows you to specify installation locations and other settings

data.name: BaseInstallation_labelAdvancedDesc
data.value: The advanced installation allows you to install Server/Client setups and to specify installation locations and other settings

data.name: BaseInstallation_labelOneClickDesc
data.value: All required applications will be installed into their default locations using default settings. The database password is "MediaPortal".

data.name: CustomInstallation_labelSectionHeader
data.value: Please choose which setup you want to install:

data.name: CustomInstallation_labelClient
data.value: This will only install MediaPortal. To watch TV it will connect to a dedicated TV-Server in your local area network.

data.name: CustomInstallation_labelSingleSeat
data.value: This is the right setup for you if the TV-Cards are installed in the same PC as you want to use MediaPortal and watch TV on MediaPortal.

data.name: CustomInstallation_labelMaster
data.value: This will only install the MediaPortal TV-Server on this PC. The PC will then act as a dedicated TV-Server and provide other PC's in your LAN with TV. (database installation required)

data.name: DBMSSettings_checkBoxFirewall
data.value: Configure Windows Firewall to allow external access to database server

data.name: DBMSSettings_errInvalidInstallationPath
data.value: You have to supply a valid installation path for the SQL-Server.

data.name: DBMSSettings_errPasswordMissing
data.value: You have to supply a password for the admin SQL-Server user.

data.name: DBMSSettings_labelHeading
data.value: Please set the needed options for the SQL-Server installation:

data.name: DBMSSettings_labelPassword
data.value: Password for admin user of the SQL Server

data.name: DBMSSettings_msgSelectDir
data.value: Select the installation folder for the SQL-Server

data.name: DBMSType_labelHeading
data.value: Please select the SQL-Server you want to use:

data.name: DBMSType_rbDBAlreadyInstalled
data.value: SQL server is already present and will be used for TV-Server

data.name: Finished_labelHeading2_install
data.value: You successfully completed the setup of MediaPortal

data.name: Finished_labelHeading3_install
data.value: Below you can find some useful links that will help you getting started with MediaPortal

data.name: HTTPDownload_errDownloadFailed
data.value: There was an error downloading the requested file

data.name: Install_errAppsMissing
data.value: Not all required applications are installed.

data.name: Install_labelHeadingInstall
data.value: Press the "install" button to perform all necessary actions to install your setup

data.name: MainWindow_AppName
data.comment: Name for the title bar of the app

data.name: MainWindow_labelAppHeading
data.value: This application will guide you through the installation of MediaPortal and all the required components.

data.name: ManualDownload_errFileNotFound
data.value: File {0} still does not exist. Please browse your disk (the filename should be similar to the proposed one).

data.name: ManualDownload_labelDesc
data.value: Hit "continue" when you finished downloading the requested file.

data.name: ManualDownload_labelHeading
data.value: You have to manually download the following file:

data.name: MPSettings_errInvalidPath
data.value: You have to supply a valid installation path for MediaPortal.

data.name: MPSettings_labelHeading
data.value: Please set the needed options for the MediaPortal installation:

data.name: MPSettings_msgSelectDir
data.value: Select the installation folder for MediaPortal

data.name: TvServerSettings_checkBoxFirewall
data.value: Configure Windows Firewall to allow external access to TV-Server

data.name: TvServerSettings_errInvalidPath
data.value: You have to supply a valid installation path for the TV-Server.

data.name: TvServerSettings_labelHeading
data.value: Please set the needed options for the TV-Server installation:

data.name: TvServerSettings_msgSelectDir
data.value: Select the installation folder for the TV-Server

data.name: Welcome_labelHeading1
data.value: Thank you for choosing MediaPortal... The FREE OpenSource MediaCenter!

data.name: Welcome_labelHeading2
data.value: This tool will guide you through the installation process

data.name: Welcome_labelHeading3
data.value: Please select your language before you continue

data.name: Finished_labelEbay
data.value: MediaPortal is FREE - if you bought it on ebay you have been fooled!

data.name: DownloadOnly_labelSectionHeader
data.value:
An internet connection is required for the installation process.
Do you want to start with the installation process now or do you just want to download the required components in order to perform the installation later ? (maybe on a pc without an internet connection)

data.name: Finished_labelHeading2_download
data.value: You successfully downloaded all MediaPortal components

data.name: Install_labelHeadingDownload
data.value: Press the "download" button to perform the download of all needed components

data.name: OS_Support
data.value: Sorry, your OS is currently not supported by MediaPortal!

data.name: OS_Warning
data.value: Your OS is unsupported because Microsoft did not release several required hotfixes for it. Continue at your own risk!

data.name: DownloadSettings_failed
data.value: Download of settings file failed. Please review your Internet Explorer configuration and try once again. A corrupted config file, if found, will now be deleted.

data.name: MPSettings_checkBoxFirewall
data.value: Configure Windows Firewall to allow external access to MediaPortal

data.name: OS_Beta
data.value: Beta version of a service pack detected, your system is not supported... Continue at your own risk!

data.name: Finished_labelHeading3_download
data.value: This application will now close and open the folder "MediaPortal Installation". Transfer this folder to your HTPC. Start installation by running "MediaPortal.DeployTool.exe".

data.name: Exit_Installation
data.value: Do you really want to abort the installation of MediaPortal?

data.name: DownloadOnly_NoConnectionWarning
data.value: No Internet connection found! To continue the installation an active connection is required.

data.name: DiskSpace_Error
data.value: There is not enough disk space left on the specified drive! For the installation of MediaPortal you need at least {0} MB of free disk space.

data.name: Upgrade_note
data.value: NOTE: You cannot upgrade from an existing SVN build, those are meant for testing purposes only.

data.name: AeroThemeMissing
data.value: Windows AERO is currently disabled. Please note that AERO is needed to avoid tearing and stuttering. Enabling AERO will also reduce CPU usage, thus making your HTPC run cooler and quieter.

data.name: Reboot_Required
data.value: A reboot is needed by a Microsoft component. Please proceed with it before continuing with MediaPortal installation.
